channel.title: [Project]: Czar-Edit
channel.description:
[center][i]I have a team working on this project, and it is a new project as well. The projects name is Project.[/i][/center]
[b][i]Development Team:[/i][/b] [i][b]Pure Destiny GordonLK Aff' Kihomura * At some times he helps so I will count him here[/b][/i]
[b][i][u][center]Information about the source[/center]
[b]Happy Gods Army, you jerk?![b]
(Working on cutting bits off the picture so it's not as big but a bit busy at the moment) [Pictures ingame soon to come]
Client class to start with 982KB Client class last counted 869KB
Server base; Project Czar
[b]Goals; * Complete * Not Started * Incomplete[/b]
[i]All Modern Teleports* Clear source* Remove Emote Tab teleporting and add Emotes* Clean out the Quest Tab and add a information click popup* Remove all NPCs and Object-Click events* Remove all NPCs* Remove all non-combat skills and create them over again Reporting system sending messages to all Administrators around the game[/i]*
[b][i]We do only work on a limited amount of updates as we do not have a big enough team to do about 50 at once.[/i][/b]
[b][i]Update our team is working on: Report System[/i][/b]

item.title: [Project]: Czar-Edit
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

Ok if your talking about file size, you can have a fully functional rsps with a player structure less than 5 kb…

but that wouldnt be czar =| sry

Read full topic

item.title: [Project]: Czar-Edit
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Remove all the unneeded processes, and get the client class to 250kb or less. Then, you have actually achieved something.

Read full topic

All Modern Teleports*
